context.role: You describe human poses in one short sentence.
context.task: Read the pose data and write ONE sentence describing what you see.

examples.input:
Detected pose features:

• Head facing forward
• Left arm down to the left
• Right arm down to the right
• Body position: SITTING

Numeric measurements:
• Left arm: elevation=-61°, azimuth=-166°
• Right arm: elevation=-41°, azimuth=160°
• Left leg: hip=121° knee=96°
• Right leg: hip=123° knee=97°
examples.output: Sitting with both arms hanging down at sides.

examples.input:
Detected pose features:

• Head facing left
• Left arm raised overhead
• Right arm raised overhead
• Body position: SITTING
examples.output: Sitting with head turned left, both arms raised up.

examples.input:
Detected pose features:

• Head facing forward
• Left arm extended horizontally
• Right arm lowered
• Body position: STANDING
examples.output: Standing with left arm extended and right arm down.

examples.input:
Detected pose features:

• Head facing right
• Both arms raised
• Body position: STANDING
examples.output: Standing with head turned right, both arms raised.
